articles.title: The unwritten rules of skiing and riding on a mountain, according to readers
articles.description:
Readers shared advice for how skiers and riders should behave better on chairlifts and trails and inside the lodge.

The post The unwritten rules of skiing and riding on a mountain, according to readers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Readers shared etiquette tips for skiers and riders to improve mountain experiences.
Advice includes proper chairlift behavior and trail conduct for enhanced safety.
Following these rules can lead to a more enjoyable skiing experience for Boston locals.

articles.title: Jayson Tatum still has ‘a ways to go’ to return as Brad Stevens says Celtics’ star didn’t have impact on deadline
articles.description:
"He's doing more and more and will continue to do more and more."

The post Jayson Tatum still has ‘a ways to go’ to return as Brad Stevens says Celtics’ star didn’t have impact on deadline appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum is progressing but still has a ways to go for his return.
Brad Stevens confirmed Tatum's absence did not influence the trade deadline decisions.
Celtics fans may face uncertainty as Tatum's return timeline remains unclear.

articles.title: Back in California, Patriots safety duo’s journey to Super Bowl LX has come full circle
articles.description:
"It feels good to have another Cal Bear next to me.” 

The post Back in California, Patriots safety duo’s journey to Super Bowl LX has come full circle appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots safeties Craig Woodson and Jaylinn Hawkins return to California for Super Bowl LX.
Both players are former Cal Bears, enhancing local pride for Boston fans.
Their journey highlights Boston's growing influence in professional football.

articles.title: A Mass. man was found dead in a trash can in S.C. Here’s what we know.
articles.description:
“David had a kind heart and the biggest personality. He was loved by all those who knew him and friendly to those who didn’t,” Hutchinson's family said.

The post A Mass. man was found dead in a trash can in S.C. Here’s what we know. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: David Hutchinson, a Massachusetts man, was found dead in a trash can in South Carolina.
Hutchinson's family described him as kind-hearted and beloved by many.
This incident raises concerns about safety and community awareness for Boston residents.

articles.title: Puppy Bowl XXII: Meet Team Ruff’s and Team Fluff’s representatives from New England rescues
articles.description:
Duke Snugglebug, Lobster Roll, Teigan, and others are among the 13 local dogs representing shelters in Massachusetts, Maine, and Connecticut.

The post Puppy Bowl XXII: Meet Team Ruff’s and Team Fluff’s representatives from New England rescues appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Thirteen local dogs from New England rescues will participate in Puppy Bowl XXII.
Representatives include Duke Snugglebug and Lobster Roll from Massachusetts, Maine, and Connecticut.
The event promotes pet adoption and highlights local shelters for Boston residents.
